responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "5CE1EA9E4B9B82A4F9E70CB5E9CB300A", "Sapnuts are the little gems you\'ll find scattered about the roots of matured oaks in this region. There isn\'t much to them at first, but if you take one of the little amber crystals and crack them open over fire, you\'ll see for yourself. The nutty aroma travels miles farther to the nearest nose of a hungry bear. It\'s what our Aela ancestors used to tame Brew Bears as a steed.")
name: ED_RVR_M901_ArgumentsSake_StriderScoutA_Dialog_41
